Description:
Business Development Associate (Dubai Office)Company: ROI ManagementLocation: Dubai, UAEVisa: Candidates with Indian/Filipino visa preferredRole Overview:Join ROI Management's Dubai team as a Business Development Associate. Leverage your communication skills to make calls, convert leads, and contribute to our growth. Work hybrid, learn about loans, web design, and business setup.Responsibilities:Make outbound calls, nurture leads, and convert them into clients.
Collaborate with sales to ensure a seamless customer journey.
Attend events to expand ROI Management's presence.
Learn about loans, web design, and business setup to offer comprehensive solutions.
Meet and exceed sales targets.Compensation:Salary: 2500-3000 AED + commissions.Apply:If you're a motivated sales professional with a passion for growth, apply now by submitting your resume and a brief cover letter. Join ROI Management in driving success.Skills
Skills:
Proven success in outbound calling and lead conversion.
Excellent English; additional languages are a plus.
Motivated and adaptable, with basic computer skills.
Prior experience in relevant fields is advantageous.
Able to balance remote and office-based work.
